name: 5/3/1 Boring But Big Variation
train_to_failure: no, but near on last BBB sets
autoregulated: yes (if you fail BBB volume, reduce load)
overview_and_execution: Run standard 5/3/1 sets (3 sets). Then do 5×10 at ~50% of TM for the same lift (or an alternate). E.g. bench day: 5/3/1 bench + 5×10 bench at 50%.
example_application: Week1 (65/75/85% for 5s), then 5×10 @ 50%. Increase accessory load slowly if 5×10 is easy.
important_notes: Focus on big volume after main sets, so watch recovery. Keep rest short for BBB sets. A classic hypertrophy variation of 5/3/1.
volume_metrics: 3 main working sets + 5 sets of 10 = 8 total sets
